intro.title: Have fun & earn tokens with Chess-on-chain
intro.description:
Challenge other wallets to play against you or play against an AI.
Earn points by playing and winning.
Complete recurring quests and collect achievements!

our_strength.title: Our Strength
our_strength.subtitle: What makes Protocal Pawns special?
our_strength.description: There are very few games that can run fully on-chain, chess can be one of those. There will be a play2earn FT, that serves as a way to earn protocol revenue from wager matches and others.

features.title: Transparency
features.description: The transparency of blockchain websites brings a whole new level of excitement to the chess game. Playing chess on a blockchain give you full transparency of what players have been doing.

features.title: Well-known game
features.description: Chess is probably one of the most played and most well known games around the world. It is easy for whether a beginner or an expert player to start. Anyone can start enjoying it in no time.

easy_play.title: Simple and easy to play
easy_play.description:
Our chess game offers a simple and easy way to play while maintaining a familiar look and feel.
The traditional chess look gives players a sense of familiarity and comfort.
This familiar look and feel not only make our chess game more enjoyable for experienced players, but also help to bridge the gap between physical and digital chess for those who are new to the game.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Develop to the Next Steps
roadmap.description: In order to enhance the user experience the development roadmap for our chess game update consists of several key milestones.

steps.title: Telegram Wallet
steps.description: The immediate next step for Protocol Pawns is to launch inside the Near Telegram wallet from HOT. There is an app store dedicated to games.

steps.title: Money Match
steps.description: There will also be money matches and a betting feature. Those are technically also implemented in the smart contract, but havenâ€™t be launched yet.

steps.title: Fungible Token
steps.description: There will be a play2earn FT that can earn protocol revenue from wager matches and betting. It needs to be paired in an LP and sold to the protocol to earn revenue.

begin_match.title: Begin a Match
begin_match.description: Start your journey to become the best chess player.

questions.question: How can I earn on-chain points?
questions.answer: You can earn on-chain points by playing and winning games. The more games you win, the more points you earn.
